title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Another day with more BREAKING NEWS in the NFL. Colin gives his thoughts on the Chiefs trading WR Tyreek Hill to the Dolphins. He believes the Chiefs are losing ground of the AFC with other teams making massive improvements and what this means for Dolphins QB Tua Tagovailoa. Plus, Nick Wright from First Things First reacts live to the news about his beloved Chiefs trading their best wide receiver. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
